mapper.select: select c.c_seq as c_seq, c.camp_id as camp_id, p.p_seq as p_seq, p.p_name as p_name, c.c_qty, p.p_price as p_price, (p_price * c_qty)c_price from camp_mem m, camp_products p, camp_cart c where m.cm_id = c.camp_id and p.p_seq = c.p_seq and c.camp_id=#{camp_id} order by c.c_seq
mapper.update: update camp_cart set c_qty=#{c_qty} where camp_id=#{camp_id} and p_seq=#{p_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from camp_cart where camp_id=#{camp_id} and p_seq=#{p_seq}
mapper.update: update camp_cart set c_qty=c_qty+#{c_qty} where camp_id=#{camp_id} and p_seq=#{p_seq}
mapper.select: select c_qty from camp_cart where p_seq = #{value}
